title: [Self-Directed] Wireless Network Channel State Information Estimation: Design of Learning-Based Adaptive Algorithms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wireless network concepts and foundational understanding of machine learning
context.additional_context: Practical training course for corporate wireless network administrators, offering flexible learning environments using personal devices. Evaluates real-world application abilities through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze channel state information (CSI) characteristics in various wireless network scenarios to extract scenario embeddings.
Learners can design channel estimation methods optimized for specific network environments using learning-based adaptive algorithms.
Learners can understand and apply a hypernetwork structure combining a CNN-based encoder and an MLP tuning module in practical settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
